data.name: Schwarzerblitz - Arcus Chroma Collaboration Costume
data.detailed_description:
Grab and Dodge!

Donner cosplays as the demonic Nosferatu, in this official Arcus Chroma crossover costume! Yield to the dark side and unleash your fury!

Important Note

To use this DLC costume, you need first to have unlocked Donner Misterkay by either:
  • clearing the game's arcade mode with all 16 main characters OR
  • answering YES to the initial "unlock all characters" prompt OR
  • using one of the cheat codes listed in the Discussion threads.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 (4th generation or higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This DLC pack requires around 4MB of disk space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 (4th generation or higher)
